item.title: Useful Notes
item.description: A page dedicated to quick and easy commands used.

item.title: pfSense - Building a Secure Firewall
item.description: My Journey with pfSense: Building a Secure Firewall Link to heading Introduction Link to heading I decided to implement a physical pfSense firewall after virtualising it for some years. Virtualising it had its downfalls. For example, when the “internet” decides it wants to drop because you’ve made some rookie networking errors 👀 . Especially when the rest of your house depends on the routing you’re in control of. It was time to make a change.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post! Hello world!

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to My Blog! 🎉 This is where I plan to write about my triumphs and troubles in my cyber homelab. I aim to provide details on the projects I have worked on and new experiments I progress with. About Me 👤 I am a Cyber Security enthusiast with a thirst for tinkering in my homelab. I am forever playing with new tools and to be honest, there are a lot of projects I wish I had finished.

item.title: Projects
item.description: 🛠️ My Projects Ticklist Link to heading 🔧 Infrastructure Projects Link to heading 🟢 pfSense Firewall Link to heading ☑️ Status: Ongoing 🟢 Synology NAS Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: Backup of all Virtual Machines ☑️ Status: Implemented 🟢 WD NAS Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: PLEX Media Server ☑️ Status: Implemented 🟢 iDRAC R710 Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: Used as an Ethical Hacking environment running on Proxmox ☑️ Status: Completed
